name: Fun in my Room
description:
Hii!!!

My name is Josiel, i'm a indie dev from Brazil. This is my first game, made for "The Indie Tales Jam".

The game is about a boy who moves into his father's old house, in his father's old room he found an old console,

in which he spends hours of the day playing!

I hope you like, and don't forget to rate on https://zanzador.itch.io/fun-in-my-room.

And please follow me in:

Twitter: @josieljaschke

Twitter: @ZanPixGD

Instagram: @josieljaschke

Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/zanzador

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCyqPidMiLmogTd6pMfosW9w

Itch.io: https://zanzador.itch.io

Thanks for playing!!! =D

#IndieTales
